notes.text:
This update for FUSE fixes the following security issue:

    * CVE-2015-3202: FUSE did not clear the environment upon execution of
      external programs.

Security Issues:

    * CVE-2015-3202
      <http://cve.mitre.org/cgi-bin/cvename.cgi?name=CVE-2015-3202>
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: fusermount in FUSE before 2.9.3-15 does not properly clear the environment before invoking (1) mount or (2) umount as root, which allows local users to write to arbitrary files via a crafted LIBMOUNT_MTAB environment variable that is used by mount's debugging feature.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
